column5: Great for fishing in Port Bruce, Ontario. Rent a trailer near the lake for $45 a night. Sleeps 6 and equipped with everything you would need away from home - (shower, bath, washroom, fridge, stove, kitchen with all utensils and plates, pots..... Additionally has a air conditioner, and outside barbecue and picnic table.Email your information to [emailÂ protected] and the dates you would like to stay. Alternatively call at 226-970-1035
